snippet.title: Glyphica Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Weaponize your WPM. Glyphica: Typing Survival is a single-player roguelite horde survival game that lets you mow down hordes of enemies in a minimalistic arena using your finger dexterity, your choice of weapons loadout, and sheer determination.

Wishlist on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2400160/Glyphica_Typing_Survival/?utm_source=SqueakyYTEA

Music and SFX: https://www.imbainteractive.com/
Camera : Razer Kiyo Pro
Keyboard : Razer BlackWidow V4 Pro
